ratecardImportantNotice: * This rate card is generated based on the company's standard job titles and rates. However, you have the flexibility to modify it according to the project. These changes will not impact the organization's standard job titles and rates.
alreadyImportedRateCardMessage: A rate card has already been imported. Clear all imported rate cards to add a new one.

budgetOverviewTooltips.manualBudget: Manual project budget amount set by project manager
budgetOverviewTooltips.totalActualCost: Total actual cost including fixed costs
budgetOverviewTooltips.variance: Difference between manual budget and actual cost
budgetOverviewTooltips.estimatedHours: Total estimated hours from all tasks
budgetOverviewTooltips.fixedCosts: Total fixed costs from all tasks
budgetOverviewTooltips.timeBasedCost: Actual cost from time tracking (excluding fixed costs)

budgetModal.title: Edit Project Budget
budgetModal.description: Set a manual budget for this project. This budget will be used for all financial calculations and should include both time-based costs and fixed costs.

budgetSettingsDrawer.title: Project Budget Settings
budgetSettingsDrawer.projectBudgetTooltip: Total budget allocated for this project
budgetSettingsDrawer.workingHoursPerDayTooltip: Number of working hours in a day for man-day calculations
budgetSettingsDrawer.hourlyCalculationInfo: Costs will be calculated using estimated hours × hourly rates
budgetSettingsDrawer.manDaysCalculationInfo: Costs will be calculated using estimated man days × daily rates
budgetSettingsDrawer.calculationMethodChangeNote: • Changing the calculation method will affect how costs are calculated for all tasks in this project
budgetSettingsDrawer.immediateEffectNote: • Changes take effect immediately and will recalculate all project totals
budgetSettingsDrawer.projectWideNote: • Budget settings apply to the entire project and all its tasks

columnTooltips.hours: Total estimated hours for all tasks. Calculated from task time estimates.
columnTooltips.manDays: Total estimated man days for all tasks. Based on {{hoursPerDay}} hours per working day.
columnTooltips.actualManDays: Actual man days spent based on time logged. Calculated as: Total Time Logged ÷ {{hoursPerDay}} hours per day.
columnTooltips.effortVariance: Difference between estimated and actual man days. Positive values indicate over-estimation, negative values indicate under-estimation.
columnTooltips.totalTimeLogged: Total time actually logged by team members across all tasks.
columnTooltips.estimatedCostHourly: Estimated cost calculated as: Estimated Hours × Hourly Rates for assigned team members.
columnTooltips.estimatedCostManDays: Estimated cost calculated as: Estimated Man Days × Daily Rates for assigned team members.
columnTooltips.actualCost: Actual cost based on time logged. Calculated as: Time Logged × Hourly Rates for team members.
columnTooltips.fixedCost: Fixed costs that don't depend on time spent. Added manually per task.
columnTooltips.totalBudgetHourly: Total budgeted cost including estimated cost (Hours × Hourly Rates) + Fixed Costs.
columnTooltips.totalBudgetManDays: Total budgeted cost including estimated cost (Man Days × Daily Rates) + Fixed Costs.
columnTooltips.totalActual: Total actual cost including time-based cost + Fixed Costs.
columnTooltips.variance: Cost variance: Total Budgeted Costs - Total Actual Cost. Positive values indicate under-budget, negative values indicate over-budget.
